/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Buildings and trees line the sides of the road, adding depth and context to the image. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
